name: abn-amro-statements
description: Tool for dealing with ABN Amro bank statements
author: Martin Gill

scripts.cover: istanbul cover ./node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/remap-report -t html
scripts.cover-lcov: istanbul cover ./node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js --captureExceptions && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/remap-lcov.info -t lcovonly
